data.name: abtDesc
data.value: A fast, lightweight alternative to MSI Center for MSI laptops, written in C#.

data.name: dlgProfAdd
data.value: Please enter a name for your new fan profile:

data.name: dlgProfChangeDesc
data.value: Please enter a new description for your fan profile:

data.name: dlgProfDel
dlgProfRen
data.value: Please enter a new name for your fan profile:

data.name: dlgSvcDelData
data.value:
Also delete the YAMDCC data directory (located at {0})?
Click "Yes" only if you don't intend to re-install YAMDCC.
WARNING: Make sure you save your config using the "Save config" button before clicking "Yes" here!

data.name: dlgSvcStop
data.value:
Are you sure you want to stop the YAMDCC service?
YAMDCC will close once the service is stopped.

data.name: dlgUninstall
data.value:
Are you sure you want to uninstall the YAMDCC service?
Only proceed if you would like to delete YAMDCC from your computer or move its program files to another folder.
YAMDCC will close once the uninstall is complete.

data.name: exSvcTimeout
data.value: Failed to connect to the YAMDCC service (connection timed out).

data.name: dlgSvcStartCrash
data.value: The YAMDCC service crashed while starting. Check the Event viewer and service log for crash details.

data.name: dlgSvcInstallFail
data.value:
The service failed to install.
Try running the YAMDCC config editor again, and if the service installation fails again, open a bug report with this error.

data.name: dlgSvcNotFound
data.value:
The YAMDCC service is not installed on this computer, and the executable (yamdccsvc.exe) was not found in the same folder as this program.
Re-download/re-install YAMDCC to fix this.

data.name: dlgSvcNotInstalled
data.value: The YAMDCC service is not installed yet. Would you like to install it now? (Clicking "No" will quit the program.)

data.name: dlgSvcStopped
data.value: The YAMDCC service is currently not running. Would you like to start it now? (Clicking "No" will quit the program.)

data.name: ttAbout
data.value: Show information about this program, including version, copyright and licensing information.

data.name: ttApply
data.value: Applies the currently loaded config to the system.

data.name: ttChgLim
data.value: Set to anything other than "0" (i.e. 1-100) to limit the charge level of your laptop's battery to the specified percentage. Set to "0" to disable this feature.

data.name: ttECMon
data.value: When enabled, information about the fan speed and RPM, and the temperature of the component being cooled by the fan (e.g. CPU) to the status bar.

data.name: ttExit
data.value: Click to quit YAMDCC. The YAMDCC service will continue to run in the background.

data.name: ttFanSel
data.value: The fan to adjust a fan profile for. Depending on your laptop, there may be multiple "virtual" fans listed here, even if your laptop only has one physical fan.

data.name: ttFullBlast
data.value: Check to set all fans to full blast.

data.name: ttKeySwap
data.value: Check to swap the Windows and Fn keys' functions.

data.name: ttLoadConf
data.value: Click to load an XML config to edit or apply.

data.name: ttNotSupported
data.value: This feature is not supported by your system.

data.name: ttProfAdd
data.value: Click to create a new fan profile with the currently selected profile's settings.

data.name: ttProfChangeDesc
data.value: Click to change the currently selected fan profile's description.

data.name: ttProfDel
data.value: Click to delete the currently selected fan profile.

data.name: ttProfRen
data.value: Click to change the currently selected fan profile's name.

data.name: ttProfSel
ttRevert
data.value: Click to revert the currently loaded config to when it was first loaded using "Load Config", or saved using "Save Config", whichever came last.

data.name: ttSaveConf
data.value: Click to save the currently loaded config to an XML file.

data.name: ttSource
data.value: Click to go to this project's GitHub page.

data.name: ttSvcStop
data.value: Click to stop the YAMDCC service. This will also quit the YAMDCC config editor (this program).

data.name: ttSvcUninstall
data.value: Click to uninstall the YAMDCC service (and quit the YAMDCC config editor). Only do this if you want to uninstall YAMDCC or move its program files to another location.

data.name: dlgUninstallErr
data.value: Failed to uninstall the YAMDCC service!

data.name: dlgSvcStopErr
data.value: Failed to stop the YAMDCC service!

data.name: dlgNoAdmin
data.value:
If you see this message, YAMDCC is not running as an Administrator.
Please re-run this program as Administrator (by right-clicking on this program and clicking "Run as administrator").

data.name: dlgOldConfMissing
data.value: The last loaded/saved config was moved or deleted.

data.name: dlgOldConfInvalid
data.value: The last loaded/saved config is invalid.

data.name: dlgRevert
data.value: Are you sure you want to revert to the last loaded/saved config?

data.name: statSvcErr
data.value: ERROR: Service command {0} failed to run.

data.name: statResponseEmpty
data.value: WARN: Received an empty response from service.

data.name: statFBToggled
data.value: Full Blast toggled successfully!

data.name: statConfApplied
data.value: Config applied successfully!

data.name: statConfLoading
data.value: Loading config, please wait...

data.name: statNoConf
data.value: Please load a config to start

data.name: statSvcTimeout
data.value: WARN: Service has not responded for a while. Try restarting YAMDCC.

data.name: dlgECtoConfStart
data.value:
Would you like to copy your laptop's default fan profiles to this config?
You will need to reboot your computer to reset the fan profiles to their defaults.

data.name: dlgECtoConfErr
data.value:
An error occurred while fetching your laptop's default fan curves.
This is probably a bug; please report this to YAMDCC's issue tracker, including the log folder (located at {0}).

data.name: dlgECtoConfSuccess
data.value:
Your laptop's default fan curves have been saved to the currently applied config successfully.
Make sure to save your config (using the "Save config" button)!

data.name: dlgECtoConfReboot
data.value:
Your laptop hasn't rebooted yet following a request to copy the default fan profiles of your laptop to the loaded config.
Cancel copying the default fan profiles and continue loading YAMDCC?

data.name: abtCopyright
data.value: Copyright © Sparronator9999 (and contributors), 2023-2024. YAMDCC and its authors are not affiliated with Micro-Star International Co., Ltd. in any way, shape, or form.

data.name: ttUpT
data.value:
This is the temperature that the component being cooled by this fan must warm up to before the fan speeds up.
Recommended values: If your lowest fan speed is set to 0% (off), start at ~45-50°C, otherwise start higher (~50-55°C). Keep increasing to around 75-90°C for the highest up threshold.

data.name: ttDownT
data.value:
This is the temperature that the component being cooled by this fan must cool down to before the fan slows down.
Recommended values: Set every down threshold to ~3°C below the next up threshold (i.e. the one diagonally up and to the right of this down threshold). Increase the gap (e.g. to 5°C) if your fan often cycles on and off or between two speeds while idling.

data.name: ttFanSpd
data.value:
This is the fan speed that the fan will run at when the component's temperature is between the up and down thresholds below.
Recommended values: To turn the fan off at idle, set the lowest fan speed to 0%. Start at ~30-40% for the next speed up (depending on your laptop), increasing to (or close to) 100% for the highest setting.

data.name: ttKeyLight
data.value: Drag to the right to increase your laptop's keyboard backlight brightness, or drag left to decrease it (or turn it off).

data.name: ttPerfMode
data.value:
Select the performance mode of your laptop here. Note that this is different from Windows' power plans.
Performance mode description: {0}

data.name: Crash
data.value:
YAMDCC has crashed!
Before reporting a bug, try again on the latest release of YAMDCC (if available). If the crash still occurs, please create an issue with the following crash report:

data.value: Installing YAMDCC service. This may take some time...

data.value: Uninstalling YAMDCC service. This may take some time...
